descr: "A provider issued list of services and products provided, or to be provided, to a patient which is provided to an insurer for payment recovery."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a Claim resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "The business identifier for the instance: claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the resource instance."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: type
fields.descr: "The category of claim, eg, oral, pharmacy, vision, insitutional, professional."

fields.name: subType
fields.descr: "A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType."

fields.name: use
fields.descr: "Complete (Bill or Claim), Proposed (Pre-Authorization), Exploratory (Pre-determination)."

fields.name: _use
fields.descr: "Extensions for use"

fields.name: patient
fields.descr: "Patient Resource."

fields.name: billablePeriod
fields.descr: "The billable period for which charges are being submitted."

fields.name: created
fields.descr: "The date when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed."

fields.name: _created
fields.descr: "Extensions for created"

fields.name: enterer
fields.descr: "Person who created the invoice/claim/pre-determination or pre-authorization."

fields.name: insurer
fields.descr: "The Insurer who is target of the request."

fields.name: provider
fields.descr: "The provider which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization."

fields.name: organization
fields.descr: "The organization which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization."

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "Immediate (STAT), best effort (NORMAL), deferred (DEFER)."

fields.name: fundsReserve
fields.descr: "In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates no funds reserving is requested."

fields.name: related
fields.descr: "Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services."

fields.name: prescription
fields.descr: "Prescription to support the dispensing of Pharmacy or Vision products."

fields.name: originalPrescription
fields.descr: "Original prescription which has been superceded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products. For example, a physician may prescribe a medication which the pharmacy determines is contraindicated, or for which the patient has an intolerance, and therefor issues a new precription for an alternate medication which has the same theraputic intent. The prescription from the pharmacy becomes the 'prescription' and that from the physician becomes the 'original prescription'."

fields.name: payee
fields.descr: "The party to be reimbursed for the services."

fields.name: referral
fields.descr: "The referral resource which lists the date, practitioner, reason and other supporting information."

fields.name: facility
fields.descr: "Facility where the services were provided."

fields.name: careTeam
fields.descr: "The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications."

fields.name: information
fields.descr: "Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required."

fields.name: diagnosis
fields.descr: "List of patient diagnosis for which care is sought."

fields.name: procedure
fields.descr: "Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication."

fields.name: insurance
fields.descr: "Financial instrument by which payment information for health care."

fields.name: accident
fields.descr: "An accident which resulted in the need for healthcare services."

fields.name: employmentImpacted
fields.descr: "The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s)."

fields.name: hospitalization
fields.descr: "The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center."

fields.name: item
fields.descr: "First tier of goods and services."

fields.name: total
fields.descr: "The total value of the claim."
